description: A hands-on guide to data manipulation, analysis, and cleaning using Pandas and Python.
Practical lab on linear regression modeling, training, testing, and visualization using real-world datasets.
Learn preprocessing, splitting data, encoding, and building a linear regression model with predictions
Predicting salaries using linear and polynomial regression, visualizing results, and evaluating model performance.
Hands-on exercises using SVR kernels and Decision Trees for regression and classification tasks.
